lines.text: Contact Dick Tracy at once. Have him go over to the Flawless Furs warehouse. Dillon reports some shenanigans - a busted fuse box at the garage.
Then tell him to call-tell him to call an electrician, not Dick Tracy
Now come on, Pat! The night watchman has disappeared. It might be homicide.
Oh, that's different. I'll tell Dick Tracy right away!
Find what you're lookin' for, Tracy?
No... and see that I don't. I understand Hatchet Harry has been hangin' around here.
Why, that's a big mistake! Say, you know I run a respectable joint.
Hot furs are bad enough, but he's gotta tie him up in a murder. We'll never get our dough, never! All because of your itchy hangnail!
[Dick Tracy breaks another date with Tess to pursue a villain]

[sigh]
Sometimes, I wish I had been a super criminal.
Because then I might get to see something of Mr. Dick Tracy!
